info.name: PlayFab Service | VMC
info.description:
Postman collection for the PlayFab VMC (View Marketplace) API. The collection mirrors the current OpenAPI spec and keeps the existing folder layout while adding missing endpoints and clearer documentation.

Setup:
1) Set {{baseUrl}} to your running instance (e.g. http://localhost:3000).
2) Aliases come from src/data/titles.json (prod, bedrock, edu, demo, staging, stage, dev, experimental, creator).
3) Variables used: {{creator1}} / {{creator2}}, {{keyword}}, {{tag}}, {{itemId}}, {{friendlyId}}.
4) ETag-aware endpoints return an ETag header for caching.

Auth:
- Call Login to get a JWT and store it in {{token}}.
- Most marketplace, admin, and event endpoints require Bearer auth.

item.name: Health / Meta / Docs

request.description: Simple service root response for quick connectivity checks.

Fetch the live OpenAPI specification used by Swagger UI.
